thread.title: Travel journalism industry mourns death of Keith Bellows
thread.title_full: Travel journalism industry mourns death of Keith Bellows

author: eTN Editor
title: Travel journalism industry mourns death of Keith Bellows
text:
Travel journalism industry mourns death of Keith Bellows   
Sep 02, 2015 Keith Bellows eTN   
Keith Bellows, former editor of National Geographic Traveler, died Saturday. He was a North American Travel Journalists Association (NATJA) member, supporter, and friend. 
Keith always made himself available to impart his wisdom and thoughts on the future of the travel media industry at NATJA conferences. 
In his memory, NATJA will create an award that exemplifies his integrity, vision, and love of travel. 
The industry has lost a giant and he will be missed. Click here to read Keith's obituary on National Geographic. Source: North American Travel Journalists Association (NATJA)
